Topic.Title: tenth planets in the solar system and you could own it!!!

Posts.EditableText: yep, i kid you not there is a tenth planet in this solar system and probably a lot more. it is called Quaoar (kway'oh'ar), it is 4 billion miles fron the sun, 1 billion from Pluto, and about 70% the size of it. currently you can buy little bits of the moon for yourself, an acre for $20! it's ceaper than buying the rain forest ($25). coming some is marz, venus and io (one of jupiter's moons, i hear it quite nice). but i'm sorry to say that the sun is already taken, as well as loads of asteroids, and a gigantic clapassed sun made completely out of diamond, and its several billion carrots!!! sadly enough i'm already trying to getQuaoar if it's not gone already. lol. the web page is http://www.planetaryinvestments.com have fun.
